name: TVG (The Vox Games). Journey
description: TVG - Journey is a voxel like, medieval escort wagon game. It is a prequel to the upcoming medieval aRPG game. The aim of the game is to escort wagon to all the villages protecting it from all the enemies encountered on the way. On the way you will encounter numerous different enemies and obstacles. You will be able to collect different types of clothings and upgrade your equipment. The game is short, and it should be treatened as an introduction to the vox games I am an will be developing.
